imdb.plot outline: Heirs From Another Star is a Chinese parody film about the two Korean dramas Man From the Stars and Heirs. The plot revolves around a Qing dynasty prince who time-travels to modern China to become a teenage heir attending a rich high school while in a brotherly intense battle. He has mad Wuxia skills so he can escape in an instant and freeze anyone, not to mention that he's a genius with photographic memory.
imdb.title: Heirs from another star
